bibl.title: The Queen Surveys her Realm: The Nile Cruise of Cleopatra VII.
bibl.note: Cleopatra's Nile cruise seems to have been designed to help conclude this troubled time and calm her subjects by publicly advertising, like Ptolemy VI, her own control of the affairs and the territory of the kingdom, if not to extend it to Ethiopia; it was also an occasion to publicly advertise the impending birth of an heir.
bibl.seg: Peek Cecilia M., The Queen Surveys her Realm: The Nile Cruise of Cleopatra VII.

Cleopatra's Nile cruise seems to have been designed to help conclude this troubled time and calm her subjects by publicly advertising, like Ptolemy VI, her own control of the affairs and the territory of the kingdom, if not to extend it to Ethiopia; it was also an occasion to publicly advertise the impending birth of an heir.
